scripts.bkend-deploy: cd udagram-api/www && eb init udagram-api -r AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION  -p node.js && eb use udagram-api-dev &&  eb setenv ENV=$ENV POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST POSTGRES_DB=$AWS_DATABASE POSTGRES_USER=$POSTGRES_USERNAME POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD BCRYPT_PASSWORD=$BCRYPT_PASSWORD JWT_SECRET=$JWT_SECRET SALT_ROUNDS=$SALT_ROUNDS  PORT=$POSTGRES_PORT && eb deploy
scripts.frend-deploy: aws s3 cp --recursive --acl public-read udagram-frontend/www/ s3://udagramemanbucket/
